medical_history.chief_complaint: Epidermal inclusion cyst following bacillus Calmette-Gu√©rin vaccination.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The cyst presented as a 2-cm subcutaneous swelling over the left arm, increasing in size and becoming erythematous over the previous 3 weeks.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Iron deficiency anemia treated with oral iron supplements; history of three miscarriages attributed to prothrombin gene mutation.
medical_history.family_history: The patient's son bruised easily and had been diagnosed with type I von Willebrand's disease.
